description:
If you have a criminal, civil, commercial or family law matter you need to address, you can turn to the experienced and responsive attorneys at Klein, Daday, Aretos & O'Donoghue, LLC, in Chicago, Illinois, for the unmatched representation you need to help you obtain the positive results you seek. Regarded as one of the area's top full-service law firms, we have achieved notable success delivering focused, creative and cost-effective solutions for our clients in a variety of practice areas for more than 30 years.

From criminal defense and family law to bankruptcy and estate planning, we are here to help you protect yourself, your loved ones and your assets for the future. In addition, we offer exceptional legal counsel in all areas of corporate law as well as real estate law and transactions, condominium and common interest association law, banking, finance and more. We also maintain a successful appellate practice to help you challenge a previous ruling regarding your case so that you can find the justice you deserve.

Passionate about helping you achieve your goals, we promise to work closely with you throughout all legal proceedings to ensure we have done all we can to address your needs. Working as a team, our law firm's attorneys will provide the solid advice and counsel to help you make the best-informed decisions on the matters that affect your case so that you can proceed with confidence.

For all of the serious and complex legal challenges affecting your life, your company and your future, you can trust the attorneys at Klein, Daday, Aretos & O'Donoghue, LLC, to help you face your issues head on. To discuss your matter further with one of our legal professionals, you can contact our Chicago law office or visit our website to schedule an appointment for a consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
